reviewText: A lighthearted look at football that's a great gift for guys. I thought this was out of print, so I was glad to find a copy to help complete our set.
This also was a Christmas present for the same grandson and he really liked the video, he is a great football fan.

This DVD actually contains 3 previous follies videos produced by NFL Films: 21st Century Follies, Talkin' Follies, and NFL's 100 Greatest Follies.  I was expecting a completely new set of follies from '97-2000 as the title suggests, but it isn't the case.  Still an entertaining collection of football bloopers tho.
This was a gift for my son-in-law, he loved it - as did my four year old grandson.
